org.pmedv.actions
Class NodeShowAction

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.struts.action.Action
      org.apache.struts.actions.DispatchAction
          org.pmedv.actions.AbstractPermissiveDispatchAction
              org.pmedv.actions.ObjectListAction
                  org.pmedv.actions.NodeShowAction

public class NodeShowAction
extends ObjectListAction

This class is responsible for all node operations

There are some methods for AJAX operations included, these methods have a null target an just fill the output stream for the AJAX requests.

Author:
Matthias Pueski
